basics.name: Cory Baird
basics.label: Data Scientist & AI Developer
basics.summary: A data scientist, AI (LLM) developer and macroeconomic researcher with expertise in central banking, NLP, and financial markets

work.name: GeoQuant (Fitch Group Subsidiary)
work.summary: Lead development of data generating processes to track asset markets and political-economic outcomes. Build and maintain all visualization, MLops and LLMops infrastucture. Backtest market signals across FX, CDS, sovereign bonds, and equities using proprietary political risk data.

work.name: Beacon Economics
work.summary: Forecasted economic growth and tax revenue using VAR and VECM models. Developed data pipelines for extraction, transformation and forecasting using Python. Led project to migrate databases from physical servers to Azure.
